whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We create authentic and bold short videos that speak for your brand. We reach the right audience and help build trust between your customers and your brand. Videos are a powerful way to communicate – they make your brand approachable and help your message stand out. Human-to-human communication makes marketing more personal, genuine, and impactful.

description.1: The story of Somesankarit begins at the Nääshalli wrestling gym, where Mirko and Roman met. A shared passion and enthusiasm for creating short videos brought them together, and making videos became a fun joint venture.
description.2: Mirko and Roman are also known from nightclub doors, where they filmed content related to nightlife. Nightclubs were also their first short video marketing clients. This sparked the idea of transitioning from bouncer work to focusing entirely on short video marketing.
description.3: The idea gained momentum when the nightclub where Mirko and Roman worked announced, just a day before New Year's Eve, that it was closing its doors. Mirko came up with the idea of creating an open job application video explaining that they had become unemployed. The job application video was filmed and published on the first day of 2025, and through it, the video reached Matias Niemi, who hired them to create content for Same Goal Clothing's TikTok. The videos garnered over a million views in the first month, leading to a significant increase in demand for their services.

mirko.description: His energetic and warm personality makes him approachable, even from a brand's perspective. Collaborations are natural, inventive, and genuinely connect with the target audience. He knows how to create content that is entertaining yet impactful, leaving a lasting impression.

roman.description: Humor is his superpower! This creative social media influencer charms with his short videos that combine humor, self-irony, and genuine enthusiasm. A warm and always positive hero whose content brings a smile to the viewer's face every time.

aino.description: One of the boys! You know the saying, 'Behind every great man is a woman ;)'. Well, not entirely, but Aino's superpower in this team is keeping everything organized, from projects to administrative tasks. Aino strikes a perfect balance between spontaneity and precision. Her educational background includes sports and coaching, and she is currently pursuing general education studies with electives in communication and journalism.

alex.description: Alex is the technical genius of our team, mastering the skills of videography and editing. He is also an expert in web development, bringing technical expertise and creativity to the team. Alex's ability to combine visual storytelling and technology makes him an invaluable member of our team.

santeri.description: Responsible for client relationships and strategic partnerships, Santeri specializes in deeply analyzing and solving client needs. He has extensive experience in the financial sector and business development. This hero also holds a higher education degree in Business Administration with a focus on marketing.
